content.description: python program design (2017 Fall, Final, Question 12 c)

p.line: We want to write a dictionary reverser, which will take a dictionary of keys and values and make the values the keys and have the original keys become a list of values. So, if _BOLDS_mydict_BOLDE_ is _BOLDS_{1:3, 2:3, 8:9}_BOLDE_, then _BOLDS_dictionary_reverser(mydict) _RARR_ {9:[8], 3:[1,2]}_BOLDE_. Write this by filling in the blanks with the correct expressions.

content.hint: try fill in the blanks first and choose the corresponding option in answer, instead of examine if each of the options would work.
